pullRequest.title: Configuration Implementation Cleanup
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR cleans up the internal implementation of Configuration. The major changes are the following:

Removed specialty checks to continuously load specific configurations from the environment.
Removed loading of default configurations as an instance level method and moved this into the static initializer.

nodes.bodyText: Do we need both BASE_CONFIGURATIONS and GLOBAL_CONFIGURATION? We can directly use the global configurations as the base when creating a new instance. Both of these should be immutable anyway.

commit.message: Removed based configuration, updated constructor docs to reflect what a new configuration will contain
